mods.abstract: Female adult, Turkish woman, papier-mache on cloth body, wire supported arms and limbs, molded and painted features, brown hair, hair and lower face covered with short veil, green shiny fabric jacket with metallic trimming, red belt, light purple full pants gathered at ankles, all body padded for soft appearance, wire came out from shoes heel, machine and hand-made.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
